TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 28
TEI.2.document_title: Jose de las Piedras to Stephen F Austin, 03-26-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: José de las Piedras to Austin, March 26, 1828. Asking Austin to forwardletters to the governor; soldiers of his garrison wish to settle in Texas when their service expires. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 28

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*José de las Piedras to Austin, March 26, 1828. Asking Austin to forwardletters to the governor; soldiers of his garrison wish to settle in Texas when their service expires. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Nacogdoches */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="03-28-1828">March 26 1828*/date_mentioned*,*/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
*/div1*
